content.description:
Trolly Problem sits on the western slope a few minutes west of Walking The Fish and Shadow Work. It’s a large pinkish slab with a nice seam running up the left side. The climbing face points west into the nice valley below.  

 Sit Start and use the bulge as a crack / sidepull / Undercling and plant feet out to the right to lift off. Pull back hard like a Trolley Problem and power through and press off the dihedral to get into a stance. Now climb the mini-dihedral to topout.
content.location: 34.7370894, -98.6056866West of the walls containing Irrational Fears wall, Walking The Fish, Shadow Work face, etc. Head west and slightly south. The bright pink granite faces west. Or head to coords along deer trails.

content.description: Start matched low on a crimp rail then use a series of small edges get up for an easy topout
content.location: On the other end of the Trolley boulder
